block.p: An article and a chart yesterday about the surrender of Katherine Ann Power, a fugitive antiwar radical, misstated the prison time served by Susan Saxe, an associate of Ms. Power, after her arrest in 1975. It was about seven years. The article also referred incorrectly to the events that ignited student protests in the spring of 1970. Invasions of Cambodia by United States and South Vietnamese troops, not the bombing of Cambodia by United States warplanes, set off those protests.

It was about seven years. The article also referred incorrectly to the events that ignited student protests in the spring of 1970. Invasions of Cambodia by United States and South Vietnamese troops, not the bombing of Cambodia by United States warplanes, set off those protests.
